description:
At Hudson Injury Firm in Tifton, Georgia, we represent clients who have suffered serious personal injuries as the result of someone else's negligence, and clients who have lost a loved one due to such negligence. Our law firm is composed of trial attorneys who focus only on serious personal injury and wrongful death claims.

We genuinely care about providing each and every one of our clients with the utmost compassion and respect. Our motto is "Results Matter," and our goal is to obtain favorable results for our clients in the following areas:

• Automobile, truck and motorcycle accidents

• Work injuries

• Products liability

• Daycare negligence

• Bad faith insurance claims

• Wrongful death

Meet our attorneys

J. Shane Hudson received his Juris Doctor from the University of Georgia School of Law and is licensed to practice in all Georgia state courts and before the Georgia Court of Appeals, the Supreme Court of Georgia, and the U.S. District Courts for the Northern and Southern Districts of Georgia. His passion for representing the victims and families of catastrophic accidents started at a young age when he and his family were themselves catastrophically injured in a serious automobile wreck.

The attorneys at our law firm are proud to be known as two of the most experienced civil trial lawyers in South Georgia under the age of 40. We know the results we obtain for our clients will likely have a lifelong impact. Our law firm also knows that personal injury and wrongful death lawsuits can be emotionally draining for our clients. That is why we always treat our clients and their families with the highest degree of compassion and empathy. Hudson Injury Firm offers free initial consultations.
